statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 9 \\ 9 \\ 9 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -25 \\ -23 \\ -24 \\ -32 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
